
### Install required packages
install.packages("minqa") 
install.packages("HI") 
install.packages("mvnfast")
install.packages("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jayjeo/VARsignR/master/VARsignR_0.1.2.tar.gz", repos = NULL)

### Import data and set sign restrictions

rm(list = ls())
SVARdata <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jayjeo/public/master/LaborShortage/SVARdata.csv")

constr <- c(+2,+3,+5)


### Uhligâ€™s (2005) Penalty Function Method

model <- uhlig.penalty(Y=SVARdata, nlags=6, draws=2000, subdraws=1000, nkeep=1000, KMIN=1, KMAX=6, constrained=constr, constant=FALSE, steps=60, penalty=100, crit=0.001)

irfs3 <- model3$IRFS 

vl <- c("GDP","GDP Deflator","Comm.Pr.Index","Fed Funds Rate", "NB Reserves", "Total Reserves")

irfplot(irfdraws=irfs3, type="median", labels=vl, save=FALSE, bands=c(0.16, 0.84), grid=TRUE, bw=FALSE)
